reviewTitle: Great perfect size for camper or dorm
reviewDescription: Excellent quality and perfect size for camper or dorm.. shipping sucks as it came with huge dent in door but already expected something damaged as other reviews state the sameâ€¦

This arrived with multiple dents in both the doors and the top corner, and it also leaks on the inside. I am not overly pleased with the quality...although the concept seems great for a small fridge if the actual product could arrive without damages.
